description:
While Luffy continues his battle with the magnetic twins, Chopper uses a rumble ball in his battle with a hockey player - and Robin tries to recover the Straw Hat flag!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fushichou Futatabi! Tomo ni Chikau Kaizokuki no Yume
Le Phénix ressuscite ! Le rêve du drapeau pirate, une promesse faite à un ami
The Phoenix Returns! The Dream Sworn to Friends on a Jolly Roger
Возвращение Феникса! Пиратская клятва лучших друзей!
عودة العنقاء! حلم أقسم به أصدقاء على علم قراصنة
不死鳥ふたたび! 友に誓う海賊旗の夢
